alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 02 at 2:14PM CDT until April 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Fire Weather Watch Issued for Tuesday afternoon... .Minimum relative humidity values are expected to fall as low as 15 percent Tuesday afternoon and early evening. Southwesterly winds may gust as high as 50 MPH. This combination of low relative humidity values and gusty winds will result in critical fire weather conditions across portions of Osborne, Mitchell, Jewell, Nuckolls, Thayer and Fillmore counties. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR OSBORNE, MITCHELL, JEWELL, NUCKOLLS, THAYER AND FILLMORE COUNTIES... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly. Use caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
